p: The particular biological properties of (–)-borneol derivatives belonging to the ester compounds significantly affect their applicability in medical areas, especially for diverse therapeutic fields [ 104, 107, 108, 109]. (–)-Borneol esters are also found in a few plant families: For instance, the hydroxycinnamic variety in Eupatorium deltoideum Poepp. ex Spreng. and Piper caninum Blume. Such natural esters show a broad spectrum of biological properties. Bornyl caffeate and coumarate are highly antibacterial [ 110].
